name: Rainbow Sparkle Pony
description: Meet Rainbow Sparkle, the most magical pony in the land! With her shimmering rainbow mane, glittery hooves, and beautiful flowing tail, she is ready to gallop into your heart. Perfect for little ones who love magic and adventure. Includes a grooming brush and sparkle accessories.
shortDescription: Magical pony with rainbow mane & glitter hooves

name: Princess Starlight Pony
description: Princess Starlight is the royal pony of Mamma's Kingdom! Adorned with a golden crown, silky purple mane, and a stunning sparkle saddle. She comes with a royal stable playset insert and 3 magical accessories for endless adventures.
shortDescription: Royal pony with golden crown & purple mane

name: Cotton Candy Pony
description: Sweet as candy! Cotton Candy Pony has a fluffy pink and blue cotton candy swirl mane that actually smells sweet. Her soft plush body is perfect for cuddling. Machine washable and made from child-safe materials.
shortDescription: Sweet-smelling plush pony in pink & blue

name: Enchanted Twilight Unicorn
description: The Enchanted Twilight Unicorn glows in the dark with its magical LED horn! Features a shimmering silver body, flowing purple and silver mane, and a light-up spiral horn that changes colors. Includes 3 LR44 batteries. Ages 4+.
shortDescription: Glow-in-the-dark unicorn with LED color-changing horn

name: Golden Dream Unicorn
description: The Golden Dream Unicorn is pure luxury! With her golden hooves, luxurious white body with gold-flecked coat, and a magnificent rainbow tail, she is the ultimate unicorn companion. Comes in a collectible keepsake box with a certificate of magic.
shortDescription: Luxury unicorn with golden hooves & rainbow tail

name: Mini Unicorn Friends Set
description: Collect all 6 mini unicorns in this adorable friends set! Each 3-inch unicorn has a unique color scheme and personality. Perfect for imaginative play, gifting, or collecting. Comes in a colorful display case.
shortDescription: Set of 6 collectible mini unicorns in display case

name: Princess Aurora Dress-Up Set
description: Become the princess of your dreams with the Aurora Dress-Up Set! Includes a stunning purple and lavender ball gown, glittery tiara, magic wand with star top, and glass-look slippers. The gown features tulle layers and sparkle detailing. Machine washable. Fits ages 4-8.
shortDescription: Complete princess costume with gown, tiara & wand

name: Royal Princess Castle Playset
description: The Royal Princess Castle is a magnificent 3-story playset with working elevator, drawbridge, and spiral staircase! Includes 2 princess figures, 1 prince figure, horse and carriage, and 15 accessories. Easy snap-together assembly. No batteries required. Ages 3+.
shortDescription: 3-story castle with figures, elevator & carriage

name: Princess Jewelry Craft Kit
description: Create your own royal jewelry with the Princess Jewelry Craft Kit! Make tiaras, necklaces, bracelets, and rings using real gems, pearls, and golden wire. Kit includes 200+ beads, 50+ charms, 3 design templates, and full instructions. Perfect for ages 6+.
shortDescription: DIY jewelry kit with 200+ beads & princess charms

name: Princess Story Book Collection
description: A magical collection of 5 illustrated princess stories! Each book features beautiful full-color artwork and teaches important values like kindness, bravery, and friendship. Includes: The Lost Unicorn Princess, Princess of the Purple Mountains, The Brave Pony Princess, Rainbow Castle Adventure, and The Princess Who Saved Magic Land.
shortDescription: 5-book illustrated princess story collection

name: Adventure Foam Bow & Arrow Set
description: Perfect for young adventurers, this safe foam-tip bow and arrow set includes 3 colourful targets for backyard fun. Foam-tipped arrows are completely safe for children ages 5 and up. Develop hand-eye coordination and outdoor play skills while having a blast.
shortDescription: Safe foam-tip bow & arrow with 3 targets, ages 5+

name: Ranger Pro Archery Set
description: Step up your archery game with the Ranger Pro Set! This complete kit includes a sturdy target stand, 6 foam-tipped arrows, and a carry quiver so young rangers can practice anywhere. Designed for ages 7 and up with adjustable draw strength for growing archers.
shortDescription: Complete archery kit with stand, 6 arrows & quiver

name: Glow-in-the-Dark Bow & Arrow
description: Take your night adventures to the next level with LED-tipped glow arrows and a luminescent bow! Charge the arrows in any light source for brilliant glowing shots after dark. Includes 4 glow arrows and is perfect for ages 6 and up.
shortDescription: LED glow arrows for exciting night play, ages 6+

name: Gemstone Explorer Kit
description: Discover the wonders of the mineral world with 20 real gemstones hand-selected from around the globe! The kit includes a full-colour ID guide so young geologists can identify every stone, plus a beautiful display case to show off their collection. A perfect introduction to geology for curious minds.
shortDescription: 20 real gemstones with ID guide & display case

name: Crystal Growing Lab
description: Grow your own spectacular crystals with this hands-on science kit! Follow step-by-step instructions to cultivate 4 different crystal types in vibrant colours. Watch as crystals form over just a few days and learn about supersaturation and mineral structures in a fun, engaging way.
shortDescription: Grow 4 colourful crystal types â€” science kit fun!

name: Dino Fossil & Rock Dig Kit
description: Become a palaeontologist and excavate real fossils from 3 included dig blocks! Use the included chisel and brush to carefully uncover genuine fossil specimens and mineral samples hidden inside. An exciting hands-on activity that teaches patience and the joy of discovery.
shortDescription: Excavate real fossils from 3 dig blocks â€” ages 6+

name: Kingdom Quest Board Game
description: Embark on an epic strategic quest to claim the kingdom in this exciting fantasy board game for 2-4 players! Build armies, forge alliances, and outwit your rivals across a beautifully illustrated game board. With multiple win conditions and re-playable scenarios, every game is a new adventure. Recommended for ages 8 and up.
shortDescription: Strategic fantasy board game for 2-4 players, ages 8+

name: Puzzle Palace 1000pc
description: Piece together a breathtaking 1000-piece panoramic illustration of a magical unicorn and pony kingdom! The richly detailed artwork is a joy to complete solo or with friends and family, and makes a stunning display piece when finished. Printed on premium puzzle board for durability.

name: Card Clash Battle Game
description: Challenge your friends to the ultimate fast-paced card battle! Card Clash features 120 beautifully illustrated cards with unique abilities and power combos that keep every round fresh. Easy to learn in minutes but deep enough to master â€” supports 2 to 6 players for non-stop fun.

name: Mamma's Place Family Trivia

description: How well do you know the world of Mamma's Place Shepherd style? shortDescription: Speed jump rope with ball bearing handles, adjustable

name: 4-Person Camping Tent
description: Spacious 4-person camping tent with advanced weather protection featuring 3000mm waterproof coating and sealed seams. Easy setup dome structure with two doors for convenience. Includes vestibule areas for gear storage and excellent ventilation to prevent condensation. Great for family camping trips and outdoor adventures.
shortDescription: 4-person tent with waterproof coating and vestibules

name: Fishing Rod & Reel Combo
description: Complete fishing combo featuring a 7-foot medium-action rod paired with a smooth spinning reel. Ideal for freshwater and light saltwater fishing. Includes 200 yards of monofilament line, tackle box with assorted lures, and carrying case. Perfect for beginners and experienced anglers alike.
shortDescription: 7ft rod with spinning reel, line, lures & carrying case

name: Inflatable Kayak
description: High-quality inflatable kayak designed for two adults with drop-stitch construction for superior rigidity and durability. Features excellent stability, maneuverability, and includes two paddles, hand pump, and repair kit. Weighs only 28 lbs but can hold up to 500 lbs capacity. Perfect for lakes, rivers, and coastal exploration.
shortDescription: 2-person inflatable kayak with paddles and hand pump

name: Hiking Backpack 40L
description: Professional-grade 40-liter hiking backpack with ergonomic design and padded hip belt for weight distribution. Features weather-resistant material, multiple compartments, and compression straps for secure packing. Ventilated back panel reduces heat buildup during strenuous hikes. Perfect for day trips and multi-day expeditions.
shortDescription: 40L hiking backpack with ventilated back panel

name: Cooler 50qt
description: Heavy-duty 50-quart cooler with rotomolded construction for extreme durability and superior insulation. Keeps ice for up to 5 days in optimal conditions. Features a non-slip lid, built-in bottle opener, and seamless design that prevents leaks. Perfect for camping, tailgating, fishing trips, and outdoor gatherings.
shortDescription: 50qt heavy-duty cooler, 5-day ice retention

name: Olympic Barbell 45lb
description: Professional-grade Olympic barbell weighing exactly 45 lbs with 2-inch diameter sleeves to fit standard weight plates. Features aggressive knurling for superior grip and safety during heavy lifts. Made from high-strength steel with a smooth chrome finish that resists rust and wear. Perfect for powerlifting, strength training, and bodybuilding.
shortDescription: Olympic barbell 45lb with knurled grip for strength training

name: Electric Treadmill Pro
description: Advanced electric treadmill with 0-12 MPH speed range and 15% incline capability for interval and hill training. Features a large 22-inch digital LCD display showing heart rate, calories burned, distance, and time. Includes 25 pre-programmed workout routines and Bluetooth connectivity for fitness app sync. Folds for space-saving storage when not in use.
shortDescription: Electric treadmill with 15% incline and 25 workouts

name: Adjustable Dumbbell 15lb
description: Compact adjustable dumbbell with quick-adjust mechanism allowing weight changes from 5 lbs to 15 lbs in seconds. Ideal for strength training, toning, and compound movements. Features a comfortable non-slip rubber grip and durable metal construction. Perfect for home gyms, hotel workouts, and travelers seeking versatile fitness equipment.
shortDescription: Adjustable dumbbell 5-15lb with quick-change mechanism

name: Stationary Exercise Bike
description: Commercial-grade stationary exercise bike with 8 resistance levels and adjustable seat height to fit users from 5'0" to 6'2". Features a comfortable cushioned seat, dual-action pedals, and magnetic resistance for smooth, quiet operation. Includes a digital console tracking time, speed, distance, and calories. Excellent for cardio conditioning and low-impact workouts.
shortDescription: Stationary bike with 8 resistance levels and digital console

name: Cable Crossover Machine
description: Professional cable crossover machine with dual weight stacks (100 lbs each) and adjustable pulley heights for diverse exercises. Features smooth cable operations and safety stops to prevent overextension. Ideal for chest, back, shoulder, and arm workouts. Includes multiple handle attachments and foam grips for comfort and safety during training.
shortDescription: Dual cable machine with 100lb weight stacks

name: Medicine Ball 10lb
description: Professional-grade rubber medicine ball weighing 10 lbs with a textured surface for improved grip during dynamic movements. Perfect for core strengthening, plyometric training, functional fitness, and rehabilitation exercises. The durable construction withstands intense training and multiple impact exercises. Ideal for gym use or home workouts with versatile movement patterns.
shortDescription: 10lb medicine ball for core and plyometric training

name: Performance Tire 18"
description: High-performance 18-inch tire engineered for sports cars and enthusiasts. Enhanced grip and handling with responsive cornering ability. Precision-engineered tread pattern provides excellent dry road performance and stability at high speeds. Premium rubber compound ensures durability and consistent performance throughout the tire's lifespan.
shortDescription: Performance tire 18" with enhanced grip and handling

name: Winter Tire 17"
description: Specialized winter tire 17-inch with advanced ice and snow grip technology. Deep tread pattern with micro-sipes designed to bite into snow and ice for superior traction. High-silica rubber compound maintains flexibility in cold temperatures for improved braking and handling. Essential for winter driving in harsh climates.
shortDescription: Winter tire 17" for superior snow and ice grip

name: Summer Sport Tire 20"
description: Premium summer sport tire 20-inch for maximum performance and speed. Advanced directional tread design maximizes cornering grip and dry road handling. Lower rolling resistance improves fuel economy while maintaining superior braking performance. Engineered for drivers who demand the ultimate combination of performance and comfort.
shortDescription: Summer sport tire 20" for maximum performance

name: Truck Tire LT 22"
description: Heavy-duty light truck tire 22-inch with aggressive tread pattern for off-road capability. Reinforced sidewalls provide maximum load carrying capacity and durability on rough terrain. Advanced rubber compound resists cutting and bruising on rocky surfaces. Engineered for pickup trucks, SUVs, and commercial vehicles that demand uncompromising performance.
shortDescription: Heavy-duty truck tire LT 22" for off-road performance
